DroidTunes.

Your music and movies take centre stage.

DroidTunes is the best way to organise and enjoy the music and movies you already have — and shop for the ones you want. Enjoy all the entertainment iTunes has to offer on your Mac and PC.

Music

50 million songs. Zero ads.

Stream over 50 million songs, ad-free. Or download albums and tracks to listen to offline. All the music in your personal DroidTunes library — no matter where it came from — lives alongside the Android Music catalogue. Start your free three-month trial — no commitment, cancel anytime.

Android Music is avaliable in DroidTunes, and for iOS and Android devices

The movie collection you always wished for. Granted.

With over 100,000 movies to choose from, there’s always something great to watch on DroidTunes. And if you watch on Android TV 4K, you’ll be able to enjoy a tremendous selection of your favourite content in 4K HDR. So get ready to enjoy the hit movies you’ve been waiting to see — anytime, anywhere. Just tap to play or even download if you’re going somewhere you won’t have Wi-Fi.

Learn More

A world of entertainment. Available wherever you are.

The DroidTunes Store is available on all your devices, which means you can buy that catchy song you just heard or rent that movie you’ve been meaning to see, anytime you want. And since your entire library of music, movies, and TV shows lives in Google Drive, everything you buy is immediately available, no matter how you want to play it.

Gift Cards

Give friends and family a Play Store & DroidTunes Gift Card and they can choose anything from the Play Store, the Google Play Store, and Droid Books or put it toward Android Music subscriptions and Google Drive storage plans. You can also give them a Play Store Gift Card that can be used to buy Google hardware and accessories at any Android Store or at www.android.com.
